backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing book store logic with storage mixins, access control, KYC data, book and order types, and owner recovery functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a homepage hero image update and listing affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of frontend files including pages, components, and admin tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document that loads the React application entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping the app in theme and toaster providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookMediaM: Admin component for uploading, validating, tracking progress, and removing PDF, image, audio, and video media for books.
Route guard that checks identity and admin status, showing loading, denial, or recovery options as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading handling, error fallback, and session clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their name. Handles form state, validation, and profile save mutation.
frontend/src/components/books/BookCard.t: Displays a book card with cover, title, metadata, badges, and a details button. Shows sold‑out and restriction statuses based on book properties.
frontend/src/components/books/CoverImage: Renders a book cover image using a static generated asset with fallback on load error. Wraps the image in a styled container.
frontend/src/components/checkout/KycVeri: Handles phone‑OTP and selfie‑based KYC verification, including timers, input validation, and submission flows. Calls a callback when verification completes.
frontend/src/components/checkout/SelfieC: Provides camera or file‑upload selfie capture with preview, retake, and validation. Uses a custom camera hook to manage photo capture.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: UI component rendering a centered empty-state message with optional icon, description, and action.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying contact links, a customer service chat dialog, and attribution. Simple static layout with icons.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Top navigation bar showing logo, links, cart, login, and user balance. Adjusts items based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Page shell rendering header, footer, routed content, and the profile setup dialog. Wraps the entire app layout.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Utility layout component applying max-width and padding to page content. Accepts custom sizing and class names.
frontend/src/components/library/BookCont: Displays purchased book content and media in a dialog, handling loading, errors, image expansion, and file downloads. Integrates multiple media types with scrolling and download actions.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryP: Provides a button to download a purchased book's PDF, handling authentication, loading state, and error cases. Downloads the file using fetched PDF bytes.
frontend/src/components/support/Customer: Implements a customer service chat dialog where users can send messages and view threaded responses. Handles authentication hints, message submission, loading, and grouped message display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes. Initializes admin access if available.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRecovery.ts: Exposes a mutation to recover admin access with clear error mapping and invalidates admin status on success. Requires an authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks to get, save, and check admin status for the current user's profile using the backend actor. Manages query states tied to authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useBalance.ts: Adds hooks for fetching token balance and minting tokens through the backend actor. Invalidates balance queries after minting.
frontend/src/hooks/useBooks.ts: Contains hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and uploading content for books via the backend actor. Invalidates relevant book queries on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Implements hooks for fetching and mutating the shopping cart, as well as checkout, with query invalidation on updates. Also derives cart items joined with book data and total cost.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useKyc.ts: Implements hooks for phone-based OTP and facial KYC flows, submitting verification proof through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibrary.ts: Fetches a user's purchased books and provides hooks to load book content or media through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Contains hooks for retrieving single, user-specific, and all orders using the backend actor and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for organizing query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useResetStore.ts: Defines a mutation to reset backend store data and invalidate related frontend caches, with admin permission checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupportChat.ts: Provides hooks for sending support messages, fetching user/admin message threads, and sending admin replies.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and global base styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCatalogPag: Admin interface for listing, adding, editing, and managing book catalog entries and media.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Main admin dashboard providing tabbed navigation to catalog, orders, minting, support, and settings pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMintPage.t: Admin form for minting GLDT tokens to a specified principal.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Shows a table of all customer orders with details, totals, and associated book info.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRecoveryPa: Page for recovering admin access using Internet Identity with success and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Admin settings page allowing full store reset with warnings and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupportInb: Renders an admin interface for viewing grouped support message threads and replying to user messages. Uses hooks to fetch inbox data and send responses.
frontend/src/pages/BookDetailsPage.tsx: Renders detailed book information with add‑to‑cart logic, handling authentication, sold‑out states, and error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Page showing cart contents, handling single-copy validation, item removal, and navigating to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays available books with search filtering and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Processes checkout with balance checks, KYC flow, error handling, and order submission.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero section and featured books pulled from the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/MyLibraryPage.tsx: Shows user's purchased books with reading, media access, and content loading dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details and navigation options after purchase.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseConfirmationP: Displays purchase confirmation with options to view library, order details, or keep shopping.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Provides helpers to trigger file downloads from raw data blobs or direct URLs.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Includes small formatting utilities for token amounts, principals, and date formatting.
frontend/src/utils/orderId.ts: Generates an order ID string using a timestamp and random number.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Parses and validates a principal string using the ICP SDK.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state indicating a request to revert the homepage hero image to a previous asset due to a display issue.
